body: Agents lead the way for other sahuagin by scouting enemy patrols and hidden fortifications.
name: Sahuagin Agents

sections.melee: mwk trident +8 (1d8+6), bite +2 (1d4+2) or 2 claws +7 (1d4+4), bite +7 (1d4+4)
sections.other_gear: mwk trident, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, feather token (anchor), dagger, thieves' tools, 53 gp
sections.languages: Aquan, Common, Elven; speak with sharks

sections.body: During Combat The scout shoots the appropriate bane bolts before closing to melee.
sections.name: Tactics
Sahuagin Scout
sections.skills: Acrobatics +10, Climb +11, Disable Device +12, Escape Artist +10, Knowledge (geography) +7, Perception +8, Ride +7, Sense Motive +8, Stealth +10, Survival +7, Swim +12
sections.combat_gear: +1 elf-bane bolts (3), +1 human-bane bolts (3), +1 merfolk-bane bolts (3), potion of cure moderate wounds

sections.ac: 22, touch 13, flat-footed 19 (+3 armor, +3 Dex, +5 natural, +1 shield)
sections.other_gear: mwk studded leather, mwk daggers (2), daggers (4), cloak of resistance +1, stalker's mask, masterwork thieves' tools, 13 gp
sections.languages: Aquan, Common, Elven, Giant, Goblin; speak with sharks
sections.feats: Double Slice, Great Fortitude, Quick Draw, Two-Weapon Defense, Two-Weapon Fighting

sections.body: During Combat The infiltrator darts around the battlefield, attempting to flank its opponents. If it's forced to fight alone, it instead tries to ambush its foes one by one.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: rogue talents (bleeding attack +3, combat trick, fast stealth), trapfinding +3
sections.name: Sahuagin Infiltrator
sections.skills: Acrobatics +14, Bluff +11, Climb +9, Disable Device +16, Disguise +11, Intimidate +11, Knowledge (local) +8, Linguistics +8, Perception +13, Ride +7, Sense Motive +13, Stealth +19, Swim +13
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of invisibility
